body:

__[Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu](https://raiz.com.my/blog/raiz-rewards-berbelanja-dengan-110-jenama/)__

__03/02/2023__

__Raiz Rewards: SHOP ONLINE WITH 110 BRANDS (and counting!)__

Get cash bonus when you shop online with our __110 brand partners__ via Raiz and get your cash bonus invested into your Raiz account automatically! \*

__How?__

1.  Log in to your Raiz app & go to [__Raiz Rewards__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)__.__
2.  Click on your favourite brands & tap on the [__Shop Online Her__](https://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)__e__ button.
3.  Shop as usual and you will be on your way to receive your cash bonus!

*\*Terms & Conditions apply.*

Discover the best prices and offers from 110 brands across various categories and products now! These aren’t all so open your Raiz app > Raiz Rewards to discover more brands!
